com.nds.pkg

Class publication

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nds.pkg.publication

  • public class publication
extends java.lang.Object
    A publication object contains information on a publication (magazine, newspaper, newsletter, etc.) that is offered to customers.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Lee Katsumata

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      publication(connect co, int ID)
      Constructs a publication based off of information received from the database.
      publication(java.lang.String t, java.lang.String g, double p)
      Constructs a publication that is delivered daily and adds it to the database.
      publication(java.lang.String t, java.lang.String g, double p, boolean[] d, java.lang.String f)
      Constructs a publication that is delivered either monthly or weekly and adds it to the database.

    • Constructor Detail

      • publication

        public publication(java.lang.String t,
                   java.lang.String g,
                   double p,
                   boolean[] d,
                   java.lang.String f)
        Constructs a publication that is delivered either monthly or weekly and adds it to the database.
        Parameters:
        t - The title of the publication
        g - The genre of the publication
        p - The price of the publication
        d - The array holding an indicator for whether the publication is delivered on each day of the week (Monday to Sunday)
        f - The frequency of the publication (Daily, Weekly, Monthly)

      • publication

        public publication(java.lang.String t,
                   java.lang.String g,
                   double p)
        Constructs a publication that is delivered daily and adds it to the database.
        Parameters:
        t - The title of the publication
        g - The genre of the publication
        p - The price of the publication

      • publication

        public publication(connect co,
                   int ID)
        Constructs a publication based off of information received from the database. The ID is given and the publication is searched for in the database. PublicationID is set to 0 if the search fails.
        Parameters:
        co - The current connection
        ID - The publication identifier

    • Method Detail

        Returns the Publication ID

        Returns:

      • modPrice

        public boolean modPrice(double nPrice)
        Modifies the price of the publication. Returns whether the modification was successful. Passes the modification to the database.
        Parameters:
        nPrice - The new price of the publication
        Returns:
        boolean

      • setStatus

        public boolean setStatus(java.lang.String st)
        Modifies the status of the publication
        Parameters:
        st - The new status of the publication
        Returns:
